title: Unveiling the Shadow Lord
goal: Kaelen confronts Valerius and unmasks the true identity of the Shadow Lord, or at least a significant avatar of it.

beats.summary: Kaelen, fueled by Elara's sacrifice and the Heartstone's truth, confronts Valerius, his ancient power unleashed with renewed purpose.
As Kaelen presses, Valerius's facade shatters, revealing him to be not merely ambitious, but a puppet or a powerful avatar of the true Shadow Lord, Malakor.
A devastating magical confrontation erupts within the Sanctum's heart, Kaelen's ancient power clashing with Malakor's corrupted might.
The true nature of the Shadow Blight is fully revealed: a perversion of the Sages' own foundational magic, twisted by Malakor's ancient malice.
